desc: 50% Def, Rec, max HP (Dark), fills BB gauge each turn, spark damage restores HP, probable 1 KO resistance & fills BB gauge at turn start instead

dictionary.lore:
A creepy, horned doll in a hood belonging to Noxa, one of the twelve heavenly creatures assuming a human form in the earthly realm to prove themselves the most capable assistant to Emperor Yu.

Dragon was a majestic creature full of ancient power, but in the earthly realm, her kind had become mere legends and myths. Eager to carve out her new niche in these changing times, Dragon delved into the darker arts of human culture. There are rumors out there claiming her doll laughs in a rasping voice reminiscent of a great and terrible beast...

name: Dragon's Intrigue
